import React, { useContext } from 'react' import * as BsIcons from 'react-icons/bs' import { GlobalState } from '../../../../../Globalstate' import SingleEmp from './SingleEmp' function EmployeeList() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [employees] = state.employeeAPI.employeeList return (

Employee Management

There are {employees.length} Employees

{ employees.map(employee => { /**/ return }) }
Full Name Email Designation Phone Gender Emergency Phone Duty Type Status
{user.name} {user.email} {user.designation} {user.phone} {user.gender} {user.emergencyPhone} {user.dutyType} {user.status}
) } export default EmployeeList
